synopsis.text:
Figure 17 centers around Tsubasa, a reserved 10-year-old girl living in Hokkaido, Japan, who struggles to connect with her classmates. Her life takes an extraordinary turn when she discovers a crashed alien spacecraft and meets DD, an extraterrestrial police officer transporting dangerous bio-weapons known as Magyua. After an accident causes the Magyua eggs to hatch, Tsubasa inadvertently comes into contact with a spare liquid battle suit called Liberus, which grants her incredible powers.

Now united with her Liberus-created twin sister, Hikaru, Tsubasa forms the powerful Figure 17 to combat the escaped Magyua threatening Earth. As she faces these new challenges, Tsubasa begins to develop the courage and confidence she never knew she had. With the fate of the world at stake, can Tsubasa and Hikaru harness their newfound abilities to defeat the Magyua and save humanity? Join them on their thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
